title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 590.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 590.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to any general hospital which is operated
by State or local governments or voluntary agencies, is authorized to receive
and retain individuals pursuant to section 9.39 of the Mental Hygiene Law and
operates or proposes to operate a comprehensive psychiatric emergency
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
